long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Protects you from Double-Click Jacking!

Detects "duplicate clickjacking," which involves overlapping windows to fake a double-click and click the underlying browser,
and safely traps the click.
Also supports iframes and more wherever possible.

Happy Browsing !

*In rare cases, it may not be possible to block in time.
*Some controls, such as audio controls, cannot be blocked.
